archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.1.2c: c) working on security-related roles in IT functions (e.g. performing security administration, configuring firewalls, dealing with malware protection or patching systems)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
